评论详情: I ordered this in a large because I wanted it to be baggy it showed up so small it looks like it's ment for a baby

This shirt fit as expected and looked like the  description and product photos. It has 3 chilled beverages on it, which appear to be alcohol beverages for those teens or parents that want to be aware. It's reasonably priced and does what it says, so we're satisfied here.

I got the shirt with the three dog heads, and I'm not super impressed. For starters, the shirt is way more cropped in person than in the picture (it comes way above my belly button) and is a spandex material and not cotton. It also fits tight even though I got my regular size. It's still a cute shirt, but nothing like the picture.

This is such a cute tee. It's got a girly, flattering cropped cut and the martini print is so cute. The material is soft and stretchy; I believe it is 100% polyester (imagine a stretchy athletic top), and it seems that the print is a sublimation-- meaning it is infused into the material, not printed or applied on top. Due to this, I've been careful to only tumble dry it on low heat out of caution (high heat can damage sublimation prints occasionally). The top is cute, definitely on the cheaper end, but it's perfect for casual wear.

This crop top is so cute, but also thin. Because of that and because it's white, you can see everything underneath. You can even see skin-tone bras through it, so I guess we'll have to wear something over it or style it differently.

评论概述: Cute top but not for me
评论详情: I recently got this top and it is really cute, but it fits more like a crop top, not a baby tee. In addition, the graphic was printed on the shirt, and looked kind of cheap. The material was very soft and comfortable but overall it did not look good on me. I'm sure it would work for others though!

I thought this baby tee would be perfect for a casual outfit with jeans, and it truly is! I get so many compliments whenever I wear it. One thing to note is that the print on the shirt is blurry. I initially thought it would be screen-printed for a more vintage look, but it still looks like the picture provided so that's fine.  Overall, this top is really cute and has quickly become a staple in my wardrobe!
